title: PropertyFinder Agent Scraper
description: Extract real estate agent profiles from PropertyFinder.ae including contact details, listings count, specializations, and company information.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific PropertyFinder.ae agent search URL. If provided, this overrides other search parameters.

location.title: Location
location.description: Filter agents by location/area (e.g., 'Dubai', 'Abu Dhabi', 'Downtown Dubai')

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of agents
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of agent profiles to collect. Leave empty to collect all available.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: Safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit.

collectDetails.title: Collect full agent profiles
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper visits each agent's profile page for complete information including bio, specializations, and contact details.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for anti-bot protection. Use Apify Proxy (Residential) for best results.
